definition: fast and abundant (news)/clever/effective
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin

see 消息靈通|消息灵通[xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1]
Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
to be well-informed
well-informed source/person with inside information
pinyin: xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

sentences.english: The largest vendors of the system are UTStarcom and ZTE.
sentences.chinese: 小靈通終端最大的提供商是UT斯達康和中興。

sentences.english: The decision to build Akula should always be an informed one.
sentences.chinese: 造阿庫拉的決定應該總是建立在靈通的情報工作上的。

sentences.english: This is my mini smart number.
Venture capital resulted in vigour and motive power for Linktone.
sentences.chinese: 風險投資爲靈通帶來了活力，更帶來了動力。

sentences.english: E. g. He is a well-informed man.
you have to be well-informed as to how to go about being an actor.
sentences.chinese: 你要消息靈通，知道如何當演員。

sentences.english: Example : She's a really hep student .
sentences.chinese: 她真是一個消息靈通的學生。

sentences.english: The lipid-lowering function experiment of Lingtong Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 靈通膠囊的降血脂功能實驗。

sentences.english: He pointed out that this situation is due to ill-informed.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，這種情況出現是由於消息不靈通。

sentences.english: Cheap costs are the main reason for the success of Little Smart.
sentences.chinese: 小靈通成功的主要原因就在於低廉的費用。

sentences.english: Exam "Small quick" to tell us the news, we all dole is broken.
sentences.chinese: “小靈通”告訴我們這個消息，把我們大家都樂壞了。

sentences.english: However low priced mobile phones are rapidly replacing PHS.
sentences.chinese: 然而，低迷的手機價格很快取代了小靈通的位置。

sentences.english: This all helps keep me informed.
sentences.chinese: 這全能讓我一直消息靈通。

sentences.english: Weng Ziqi is not at home. She is in Lingtong School.
sentences.chinese: 翁子淇不在家，她在靈通學校了。

sentences.english: The info provided from this informer was found to be inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 這位消息靈通人士所提供的情報已經被發現是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Out of the bank, in a remote Zhang Department of PHS and throw away books.
sentences.chinese: 出了銀行，張某在一偏僻處扔掉了小靈通和存摺。
